article_title: Africell on Mission to Attract U.S. Private Equity Investment
article_text:
This copy is for your personal, non-commercial use only. To order presentation-ready copies for distribution to your colleagues, clients or customers visit http://www.djreprints.com.

http://blogs.wsj.com/frontiers/2014/11/26/africell-on-mission-to-attract-u-s-private-equity-investment/

twitter.description: Africell Holding, the largest mobile-phone operator in Sierra Leone and Gambia, is courting U.S. private-equity firms, hoping to sell a stake in the company, which is valued by the owner at up to $1.5 billion.
twitter.title: Africell on Mission to Attract U.S. Private Equity Investment
